net.truelicense.spi.io

Class StandardBIOS

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.truelicense.spi.io.StandardBIOS
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BIOS

    public class StandardBIOS
extends Object
implements BIOS
    The standard BIOS implementation. This class is immutable.
    Author:
    Christian Schlichtherle

      • copy

        public void copy(Source source,
                 Sink sink)
          throws IOException
        Copies the data from the given source to the given sink.

        The implementation in the class StandardBIOS is suitable for only small amounts of data, say a few kilobytes.

        Specified by:
        copy in interface BIOS
        Throws:
        IOException

      • resource

        public Source resource(String name,
                       Optional<ClassLoader> classLoader)
        Description copied from interface: BIOS
        Returns a source which loads the resource with the given name. If the given class loader list is empty, then the resource gets loaded as described in ClassLoader.getSystemResourceAsStream(String). Otherwise, the resource gets loaded as described in ClassLoader.getResourceAsStream(String) using the first class loader in the list.
        Specified by:
        resource in interface BIOS
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the resource to load.
        classLoader - The optional class loader to use for loading the resource. If no value is present then the system class loader gets used.
        Returns:
        A source which loads the resource with the given name.
